original_title: 元芸能人・美人妻マドンナ初登場！！ 会社も、妻も、奪われた―。社長夫人NTR 中野七緒
overview: Tetsuya Nakano, a talented president who runs an IT venture. He started an app development company with friends from college and has grown and developed it with sponsor financing. Recently, however, he has dabbled in the company's assets due to his one-man management and wasteful spending. Kazuya's centripetal force is declining, and the gears are out of order. And Higashio, an old-timer, aims for the president's seat amidst the turmoil, and approaches Nanao, who is Tetsuya's support. ? ?
title: Former Celebrity And Beautiful Married Woman Makes Her Madonna Debut!! Her CEO Husband Has Both His Company And His Wife Taken From Him NTR – Nao Nakano
